Description: Verify user can login with valid email and password
Expected Result: User is redirected to the dashboard page with a welcome message displayed

Description: Check login fails with incorrect password
Expected Result: Error message "Invalid credentials" is displayed below the password field

Description: Validate password reset email is sent
Expected Result: User receives a password reset email within 2 minutes

Description: Verify user can navigate to the registration page from login
Expected Result: Registration page is displayed with all required fields visible

Description: Confirm user can add items to shopping cart by clicking Add button
Expected Result: Cart icon shows updated item count and item appears in cart dropdown

Description: Check cart total updates when quantity is changed
Expected Result: Cart total recalculates and displays the correct amount within 1 second

Description: Verify user can apply a valid discount code at checkout
Expected Result: Discount amount is deducted from the total and a success message "Coupon applied" is shown

Description: Validate that the search bar returns relevant results for a product keyword
Expected Result: Search results page displays products matching the keyword with product names highlighted

Description: Confirm user can sort search results by price low to high
Expected Result: Products are reordered with the lowest price item displayed first

Description: Open the settings page and verify all preference toggles are functional
Expected Result: Each toggle switches between ON/OFF state and the preference is saved after page reload

Description: Validate that the user can upload a profile picture in JPG format under 2MB
Expected Result: Profile picture is updated and displayed in the header within 3 seconds

Description: Test logout functionality by clicking the Sign Out button
Expected Result: User session is terminated and user is redirected to the login page
